# Libraries:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
belly_pain <- read_csv2("./Data/belly_pain_features_osm_affect (1).csv")
burping <- read_csv2("./Data/burping_features_osm_affect (1).csv")
discomfort <- read_csv2("./Data/discomfort_features_osm_affect (1).csv")
full_data_odd <- read_csv("./Data/filtered_full_data_odd.csv")
tired <- read_csv2("./Data/tired_features_osm_affect.csv")
demographics <- read_csv("./Data/demographics_students.csv")
```

# EDA and cleaning:

Find the groups of demographics dataset:

```{r}
demographics %>%
  group_by(Reason) %>%
  summarise(count = n())
```

I see some no email and no gender and no age. clean the demographics data

```{r}
demographics <- demographics %>%
  filter(ID != 'NO-EMAIL', Age != 'NO-AGE', Gender != 'NO-GENDER')

demographics %>%
  group_by(Reason) %>%
  summarise(count = n())
```
